channel.title: RespitePK Custom PK Server
channel.description:
[center][size=12pt]This server will be all about customs. I have already added multiple custom items and there are more still to come. I can re-write skills and add content but one thing I am having real trouble with is adding the special attacks to weapons. If anyone would like to join me on this project feel free to pm me and I will give you my skype.
Btw this source was a blank pi :)
Requirements to Join Have to be above the age of 12 Know how to add specs Been coding for 6 months +
In your pm to me you must specify
Age: Knowledge of java: Any past work: Why you want to join:[/size][/center]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JtMH1MN.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sNgiYcW.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1NdGIB5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nG5bPA8.jpg[/img]

item.title: RespitePK Custom PK Server
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

Age: 24
Knowledge of java: More than most? How do you even rate this? Theoretically most people are going to rate differently. I can write my own content if that helps any.
Any past work: Ask Atomicint_
Why you want to join: boredom mostly and I like customs

Read full topic

item.title: RespitePK Custom PK Server
item.dc:creator: @BrandonHarkness BrandonHarkness
item.description:
@BrandonHarkness wrote:

What do you mean you were struggling with adding special attacks? You can add them in, in your combatassistant.java.

Read full topic
